description.p: The SSL certificate's signature algorithm is considered to be weak.

technicaldescription.p: The target server's certificate signature algorithm is WEAKALGORITHM. This algorithm is considered to be weak.
The signature algorithm can be retrieved with openSSL:
technicaldescription.pre: openssl s_client -connect target < /dev/null 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -text -in /dev/stdin | grep "Signature Algorithm"

recommendation.p: Change the next issued certificate's signature algorithm from WEAKALGORITHM to a stronger algorithm. We recommend using RECOMMENDATION.
For more details, ways on retesting and recommendations see: https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Testing_for_SSL-TLS_(OWASP-CM-001). Check the current status of your certificate on a regular basis.
